reviews.text: Some of these hotel and vacation rental search results may be personalized based on your browsing activity and recent searches on Google, as well as travel confirmations sent to your Gmail. Prices come from Google's partners. All vacation rental reviews and some hotel reviews come from third-party travel sites.
